name: ai-logistics-optimization
description: AI-Powered Logistics Optimization Platform with Frontend and Backend

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,WEBSOCKET,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:websocket" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:3003 NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=ws://localhost:8081 npm run dev -- -p 3001
scripts.dev:with-demo: concurrently -n "BACKEND,WEBSOCKET,DEMO,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:websocket" "npm run dev:demo" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:demo: sleep 5 && cd backend && DEMO_ONLY=true node src/demo/demo-orchestrator.js
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'node src/app.js' ; pkill -f 'websocket-server.js' ; pkill -f 'demo-orchestrator.js' ; pkill -f 'next dev' ; echo 'All services stopped'
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/.next frontend/.next
